gugal aayathanaya pawasanne marthumasaya pamanak salakana wita miliyanayakata adhika illim thaman wetha labi athi bawayi.owun wadi duratath pawasanne kathru himikaruwan 2400 pamana denekugen domenayan 24374 yatathe kriyathmakawana sabadatha miliyana 1.2 pamana illim labi athi bawayi.

(meya) awabodha karaganne nuwanaththan pamani. 13-20 shuddha wu kuraanaya allah samaga athikaragath giwisuma itukara sanatha kirimen pasuwa (eya) kada nokarana ayada. 13-21 shuddha wu kuraanaya thawada, ekamuthu karana lesa allah anakala da ekamuthu karannawu ayada, owunge paramadhipathita biyawannawu ayada, dadi ganan ganimata(goduru wethayi) biyawannawu ayada. 13-22 shuddha wu kuraanaya thawada, thama rab(paramadhipathi)ge somnasa soya iwasiliwanthawa sitina ayada, salathayehi nirathawana ayada, apa owunata pirinama athi dawalin rahase saha elipita wiyahiyadam karana ayada, yahakamin napurukama abhibawannawu ayada, owunataya awasana (yahapaladayi) niwahana. 13-23 shuddha wu kuraanaya sada sapathin yuth jannahwan(swargayan)ta owun ha owunge piyawarungendarna owunge ambauwangenda, owungen pawathennangenda dahamiyo athulu wethi.

liya abhiman sanwidhanaye sabhapathini nithignya pushpa rajapaksha mahathmiya me siyaluma sanwardhana katayuthu walata dawantha nayakathwayak labadunna ya.me siyalu sanwardhana katayuthu aarambha kirima, nirikshanaya kirimata, janathawa hamuwimata nirantharayen liya abhiman sanwidhanaye sabhapathini nithignya pushpa rajapaksha mahathmiyata gampaha disthrikkaya pura sancharaya kirimata siduwiya.
